response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $12,000, reflecting its high quality and unique features. Considering its worth to you could be even higher, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11,000. We believe this offers a great opportunity for both of us to benefit from this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further details, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11000}
